text: Xubuntu is a free Linux distribution based on Ubuntu. It uses the Xfce desktop environment. ==Related pages== List of Linux distributions == Other websites == * Xubuntu Official Website * Xubuntu Community Website (Unofficial) * Xubuntu at the Ubuntu Wiki * Xubuntu Tips & Tricks Blog == Sources == Category:Ubuntu (operating system) derivatives Category:X86-64 Linux distributions
title: Xubuntu
